select
,
from submit_result where sub_res_id in
#{item}

insert into submit_result (submit_id, test_id, status, used_time, used_memory, create_time, modify_time) values
(#{item.submitId}, #{item.testId}, #{item.status}, #{item.usedTime}, #{item.usedMemory}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyTime})
